Class SudokuManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • SudokuManager

  • public class SudokuManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The SudokuManager class manages the grids that are being used by the current boards. It handles the generation and solving of the boards while also supplying hints when the board is being played.
    Author:
    Thomas Tsang

    • Constructor Detail

      • SudokuManager

        public SudokuManager()
        Constructor for SudokuManager Class. Initialises the solver and generator.

    • Method Detail

      • newBoard

        public SudokuGrid newBoard(int difficulty)
        Generates a random board depending on the difficulty given.
        Parameters:
        difficulty - The difficulty of the board that needs to be generated.
        Returns:
        The board that was generated.

      • solveCurrentGrid

        public void solveCurrentGrid()
        Solves the current board that is being played. However if the player makes a wrong move and there is no solution it will use a previous solved board.

      • resetGrids

        public void resetGrids()
        Resets the current board and the solution.

      • hint

        public Cell hint()
        Provides a hint for the player by altering the current board. It will remove any cells that conflicts with the solution.
        Returns:
        The cell that the hint was inputted into.

      • getCurrentGrid

        public SudokuGrid getCurrentGrid()
        Returns:
        The currentGrid attribute of the class.

      • getSolved

        public SudokuGrid getSolved()
        Returns:
        The solved attribute of the class.
